connector.description: Store and retrieve blobs from Azure Storage Blob Service.

camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset
camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.sink.endpoint.blobType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobType
camel.sink.endpoint.blobType.description: Set a blob type, 'blockblob' is default One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead.name: camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead
camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentials
camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.sink.endpoint.dataLength.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dataLength
camel.sink.endpoint.dataLength.description: Set the data length for the download or page blob upload operations

camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir.name: camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir
camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir.description: Set the file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to

camel.sink.endpoint.publicForRead.name: camel.sink.endpoint.publicForRead
camel.sink.endpoint.publicForRead.description: Storage resources can be public for reading their content, if this property is enabled then the credentials do not have to be set

camel.sink.endpoint.streamReadSize.name: camel.sink.endpoint.streamReadSize
camel.sink.endpoint.streamReadSize.description: Set the minimum read size in bytes when reading the blob content

camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI.name: camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI
camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.sink.endpoint.blobPrefix.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobPrefix
camel.sink.endpoint.blobPrefix.description: Set a prefix which can be used for listing the blobs

camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrit.name: camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrite
camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrit.description: Close the stream after write or keep it open, default is true

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: Blob service operation hint to the producer One of: [getBlob] [deleteBlob] [listBlobs] [updateBlockBlob] [uploadBlobBlocks] [commitBlobBlockList] [getBlobBlockList] [createAppendBlob] [updateAppendBlob] [createPageBlob] [updatePageBlob] [resizePageBlob] [clearPageBlob] [getPageBlobRanges]

camel.sink.endpoint.streamWriteSize.name: camel.sink.endpoint.streamWriteSize
camel.sink.endpoint.streamWriteSize.description: Set the size of the buffer for writing block and page blocks

camel.sink.endpoint.useFlatListing.name: camel.sink.endpoint.useFlatListing
camel.sink.endpoint.useFlatListing.description: Specify if the flat or hierarchical blob listing should be used

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKe.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKey
camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKe.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountNa.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountName
camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountNa.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset.name: camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset
camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.component.azure-blob.blobType.name: camel.component.azure-blob.blobType
camel.component.azure-blob.blobType.description: Set a blob type, 'blockblob' is default One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.component.azure-blob.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.component.azure-blob.dataLength.description: Set the data length for the download or page blob upload operations

camel.component.azure-blob.publicForRead.description: Storage resources can be public for reading their content, if this property is enabled then the credentials do not have to be set

camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSiz.name: camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSize
camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSiz.description: Set the minimum read size in bytes when reading the blob content

camel.component.azure-blob.validateClien.name: camel.component.azure-blob.validateClientURI
camel.component.azure-blob.validateClien.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.component.azure-blob.blobPrefix.name: camel.component.azure-blob.blobPrefix
camel.component.azure-blob.blobPrefix.description: Set a prefix which can be used for listing the blobs

camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAf.name: camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAfterWrite
camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAf.description: Close the stream after write or keep it open, default is true

camel.component.azure-blob.lazyStartProd.name: camel.component.azure-blob.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.azure-blob.lazyStartProd.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.azure-blob.operation.name: camel.component.azure-blob.operation
camel.component.azure-blob.operation.description: Blob service operation hint to the producer One of: [getBlob] [deleteBlob] [listBlobs] [updateBlockBlob] [uploadBlobBlocks] [commitBlobBlockList] [getBlobBlockList] [createAppendBlob] [updateAppendBlob] [createPageBlob] [updatePageBlob] [resizePageBlob] [clearPageBlob] [getPageBlobRanges]

camel.component.azure-blob.streamWriteSi.name: camel.component.azure-blob.streamWriteSize
camel.component.azure-blob.streamWriteSi.description: Set the size of the buffer for writing block and page blocks

camel.component.azure-blob.useFlatListin.name: camel.component.azure-blob.useFlatListing
camel.component.azure-blob.useFlatListin.description: Specify if the flat or hierarchical blob listing should be used

camel.component.azure-blob.autowiredEnab.name: camel.component.azure-blob.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.azure-blob.autowiredEnab.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.name: camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAccountKey
camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.name: camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAccountName
camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase
